name: The End is Neigh
description:
I heard one of the four living creatures saying as with a voice of thunder, "Wait, I'm late!" 

You are one of the Four Horsemen of the Apocalypse...and you're late to the apocalypse. Catch up with the other Horsemen.

This is a project made for the r/SoloDevelopment Winter Game Jam! 

The End is Neigh was made in 72 hours with a team of 5.

The prompt was "the end is near"
